attributes.action: deprive the CofE of state connection and declare a secular state in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the UK population (with notable exceptions) is gradually, gradually coming to recognise that all religious beliefs are just mythology it is now time to start the slow process of realigning the affairs of state to take this into account by instigating debate and counting heads so that slaughter justified by faith, creationism &c. can become history, like poverty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
